name: Extend GamiPress
author: polyres

sections.description:
This plugin/add-on requires the plugin GamiPress(WordPress plugin repository)!

This free plugin/add-on extends the GamiPress Plugin, so you can react to the following WordPress events in GamiPress

  • user_register

  • delete_user

  • add_attachment

  • delete_attachment

  • edit_attachment

  • trashed_post

  • untrashed_post

  • delete_post

  • trashed_page

  • untrashed_page

  • delete_page

  • trashed_comment

  • untrashed_comment
  • delete_comment
sections.installation: 1. Install and activate GamiPress and this add-on
sections.faq:
Can your plugin also be translated into other languages?

Yes, the plugin can be translated into many languages via WordPress Translate.

Can I really use this plugin free of charge?

Yes, Extend Gamipress is available for free.

Does Extend Gamipress share any of my data? (GDPR)

No, Extend Gamipress stores no data, it simply adds various wordpress events to GamiPress.
There is no data transmitted to us or a third party service.

I need other WordPress actions to trigger GamiPress

Please wrote a comment in the plugin supportforum on wordpress.org or use the contact form on our website ( https://poly-res.com )

short_description: Extends the GamiPress Plugin for WordPress System Hooks
